Class AbstractDatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.util.sql.AbstractDatabaseConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseConnector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseAdapter, DatabaseDeleter, DatabaseExporter, DatabaseImporter, DatabaseInitializer, DatabaseUpdater

    public abstract class AbstractDatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseConnector
    A skeletal implementation of the interface DatabaseConnector.
    Author:
    Stefan Karlsson
